title: Highest GDP per capita
description: In 2023, Monaco had the highest GDP per capita in the world at $256,580.52.

title: Most marine protected areas
description: As of 2024, 100% of Monaco's territorial waters are designated as marine protected areas.

title: Highest government effectiveness
description: In 2023, Monaco ranked at the top for government effectiveness with a percentile rank of 100.

title: Highest life expectancy
description: In 2023, Monaco had one of the highest life expectancies at birth, with females living up to 88.5 years on average.

title: Lowest rural land area
description: In 2022, Monaco had the smallest rural land area in the world, covering only 0.035 square kilometers.

title: Lowest capture fisheries production
description: In 2022, Monaco had the lowest capture fisheries production, with only 1 metric ton.

title: Lowest number of infant deaths
description: In 2023, Monaco reported the lowest number of infant deaths, with only 1 recorded.
